item.title: Peloton Plans Bike Refresh, AI Integration As It Looks To Rejuvenate Sales: Report
item.description: Peloton is planning to launch an updated bike, treadmill, and new peripherals, as well as tweaking its strategy for selling refurbished equipment.

item.title: It Remains Goes Gasless On SKALE
item.description: It Remains shifts to SKALE so fans get gasless clicks, instant votes, and real power over the story.

item.title: COTI Privacy vs MEV Reality
item.description: $ROSS launched on Solana, MEV bots farmed the pools, and COTI-grade privacy would have shut the window.

item.title: USD.AI Brings Yield To Compute
item.description: USD.AI turns GPU rigs into on-chain collateral on Arbitrum and routes working capital through a yield dollar.

item.title: Marseille Ships AI On Theta
item.description: Marseille rolls out an AI concierge on Theta and joins as a validator so the club helps secure the chain it uses.
